Provides a resource which manages Cloudflare account members.

{{% example python %}}
```python
import pulumi
import pulumi_cloudflare as cloudflare

example_user = cloudflare.AccountMember("exampleUser",
    email_address="user@example.com",
    role_ids=[
        "68b329da9893e34099c7d8ad5cb9c940",
        "d784fa8b6d98d27699781bd9a7cf19f0",
    ])
```
{{% /example %}}

{{% example typescript %}}
```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as cloudflare from "@pulumi/cloudflare";

const exampleUser = new cloudflare.AccountMember("example_user", {
    emailAddress: "user@example.com",
    roleIds: [
        "68b329da9893e34099c7d8ad5cb9c940",
        "d784fa8b6d98d27699781bd9a7cf19f0",
    ],
});
```
{{% /example %}}

### Inputs

The AccountMember resource accepts the following [input]({{< relref "/docs/intro/concepts/programming-model#outputs" >}}) properties:




{{% choosable language csharp %}}
<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>Email<wbr>Address</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The email address of the user who you wish to manage. Note: Following creation, this field becomes read only via the API and cannot be updated.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>Role<wbr>Ids</span>

    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Array of account role IDs that you want to assign to a member.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

</dl>

        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://golang.org/pkg/builtin/#string">[]string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Array of account role IDs that you want to assign to a member.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

</dl>
{{% /choosable %}}

    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The email address of the user who you wish to manage. Note: Following creation, this field becomes read only via the API and cannot be updated.
